name: body
summary: The `<body>` HTML element represents the content of an HTML document. There can be only one `<body>` element in a document.
tagOmission: The start tag may be omitted if the first thing inside it is not a space character, comment, script element or style element. The end tag may be omitted if the `<body>` element has contents or has a start tag, and is not immediately followed by a comment.
permittedParents: It must be the second element of an html element.

alink.name: alink
alink.summary: Color of text for hyperlinks when selected.

background.name: background
background.summary: URI of a image to use as a background.

bottommargin.name: bottommargin
bottommargin.summary: The margin of the bottom of the body.

leftmargin.name: leftmargin
leftmargin.summary: The margin of the left of the body.

link.name: link
link.summary: Color of text for unvisited hypertext links.

onafterprint.name: onafterprint
onafterprint.summary: Function to call after the user has printed the document.

onbeforeprint.name: onbeforeprint
onbeforeprint.summary: Function to call when the user requests printing of the document.

onbeforeunload.name: onbeforeunload
onbeforeunload.summary: Function to call when the document is about to be unloaded.

onblur.name: onblur
onblur.summary: Function to call when the document loses focus.

onerror.name: onerror
onerror.summary: Function to call when the document fails to load properly.

onfocus.name: onfocus
onfocus.summary: Function to call when the document receives focus.

onhashchange.name: onhashchange
onhashchange.summary: Function to call when the fragment identifier part (starting with the hash (`'#'`) character) of the document's current address has changed.

onlanguagechange.name: onlanguagechange
onlanguagechange.summary: Function to call when the preferred languages changed.

onload.name: onload
onload.summary: Function to call when the document has finished loading.

onmessage.name: onmessage
onmessage.summary: Function to call when the document has received a message.

onoffline.name: onoffline
onoffline.summary: Function to call when network communication has failed.

ononline.name: ononline
ononline.summary: Function to call when network communication has been restored.

onpopstate.name: onpopstate
onpopstate.summary: Function to call when the user has navigated session history.

onredo.name: onredo
onredo.summary: Function to call when the user has moved forward in undo transaction history.

onresize.name: onresize
onresize.summary: Function to call when the document has been resized.

onstorage.name: onstorage
onstorage.summary: Function to call when the storage area has changed.

onundo.name: onundo
onundo.summary: Function to call when the user has moved backward in undo transaction history.

onunload.name: onunload
onunload.summary: Function to call when the document is going away.

rightmargin.name: rightmargin
rightmargin.summary: The margin of the right of the body.

topmargin.name: topmargin
topmargin.summary: The margin of the top of the body.

vlink.name: vlink
vlink.summary: Color of text for visited hypertext links.
